comments:

Please make sure not to have any other (incompatible) xerces or lucene jar files on your 
classpath. Check in:
  /Library/Java/Home/lib/ext
  /Library/Java/Extensions
  ~/Library/Java/Extensions
And throw away the workspace before restarting Eclipse.
Let me know if this fixes your problem.

I have tried to remove all jars from those locations, but it dit not help. I have WebObjects 
5.1.4 installed and I think it has xerces in its XML-framework. Other people are using WO 
and eclipse side by side without problems.

I have altso tried to log in as a different user on the same machine. Does not help.

Have tried with SDK-N20020925-macosx and 0926. They all had the same problem on 
my iMac.
